A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It's my least favorite star wars movie. After rogue one it was disappointing because rogue one is only passed by empire strikes back IMO. I really felt rogue one showed Disney knew what they were doing. I enjoyed the force awakens too (and solo!) But TLJ just crapped over everything I was expecting and hoping for. Rian Johnson cared too much about \"subverting expectations\" than to give a story that made sense and would please the fans. It seems like he wanted it to be shocking like empire but he failed.
